query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'home_config' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4C7dh5n6yXuaUbo.root --database Un9ncnuBxgCCtamkr3qHdr --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'home_config' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE	COLUMN_DEFAULT
id	int(11)	NO	NULL
carouselImages	text	YES	NULL
vipGarageImage	varchar(500)	YES	NULL
deluxeRoomImage	varchar(500)	YES	NULL
facilitiesImage	varchar(500)	YES	NULL
createdAt	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updatedAt	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
